thread.title: Take $8.62 Off Any $50 Amazon Order with This Code
thread.title_full: Take $8.62 Off Any $50 Amazon Order with This Code

author: Smart Shopping Team
title: Take $8.62 Off Any $50 Amazon Order with This Code
text:
amazon / istock Like us on Facebook 
Amazon has great deals every day, but for one day only, you can get an even better deal. Amazon just netted the highest rating ever in the Harris Poll's Corporate Reputation Ranking, and to tip its cap to its loyal users and further burnish its corporate reputation, the world's biggest store is knocking $8.62 off any order of a $50 or more today. All you have to do to get the discount is enter the promo code BIGTHANKS at checkout. If you've had your eye on anything on Amazon or just need to stock up on household essentials, today is the day to do it. 
Shop now at Amazon. 
Mental Floss has affiliate relationships with certain retailers, including Amazon, and may receive a small percentage of any sale. But we only get commission on items you buy and don’t return, so we’re only happy if you’re happy. Good luck deal hunting! More from mental_floss...
